reviewer_info: Posted by Ikonik Scanario on Feb 09, 2021
review_text:
Exterior is very beautiful and stylish
Interior is comfortable and gives you a feel that you are in are true sports car
Fuel consumption
City	24.7 L/100km
Highway	10.7 L/100km
Combined	18.4 L/100km
The performance of the car is very good its like 0-100 in 3-4 seconds and thats a very good power 
Its very expressive but its way better than a ferrari the  and buget is very low and a Ferrari is too expensive, and a lamborghini is way better choice than a Ferrari
